meanings.definition: A ridge of rocks, sand, or coral that rises to or near the surface of a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The divers explored the colorful reef teeming with fish.
meanings.sent2: The boat navigated carefully around the sharp reef to avoid damage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous octopus tried to hide in the reef but ended up startling a clownfish.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a vibrant reef, full of life and hidden wonders.
meanings.sent5: The reef shimmered under the sunlight, inviting all to marvel at its beauty.

meanings.definition: A chain or range of rocks lying at or near the surface of the water.
meanings.sent1: The shipwreck was caused by the hidden reef along the coast.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen knew to avoid the treacherous reef during stormy weather.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls perched on the reef, enjoying the view of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were turbulent, crashing against the reef of his calm demeanor.
meanings.sent5: The reef acted as a natural barrier, protecting the bay from strong currents.
